articles.description: Georgina Burnett said she is now looking forward to a 'happier chapter as a fortunate single mum'
articles.content:
A This Morning presenter who announced her split from her husband on Valentine's Day has said she doesn't want a "pity party". Georgina Burnett has separated from her husband Andy Flawn.
